Line.Text: Who the hell are you?
Someone who’s got wind of your little hacking scheme.
Someone who decided to let you talk a bit before grabbing your sorry ass.
Who I am is not important. I know that you hacked Ashley’s account. Explain, now.
Oh? Could it be that I was discovered? How fascinating. Well, tell me about yourself. You deserve a little bit of my time.
Are you not listening? I give you the first and only chance to cooperate, and you’d better believe you need it.
Great… another nutjob.
But I am cooperating, officer. It’s just that I love learning about people. I like to know their hopes and dreams… before I crush them.
Nutjob, you say? Do I contradict your definition of normal? Could you share it with me? I’d like to know more… before I destroy you.
I think you’re under a wrong impression here. We got you by the balls. You will be imprisoned before the day runs out.
What bad movie did you run away from? Well, doesn’t matter… I’m sure they can put you somewhere you’ll never escape.

Oh, no, you will never find me. This chat is just a little extra I allowed to happen. My physical location is out of your reach. You, on the other hand…[pause] are vulnerable. Naked. I will enjoy destroying your life… just like I enjoyed destroying the life of little Ashley.
But why? What did she do to you to warrant such a twisted attack?
Care to explain your reasons for that, by the way?
Ah, so you’re one of those people who like things explained, aren't you? You need a reason for everything that happens? Sorry to disappoint, but you won’t find it here. Why, you ask? Because I could.
Would you like me to? Do you feel more comfortable when things are explained and make sense? Sorry to disappoint, but this won’t be the case here.[pause] Why did I do it, you ask? Because I could.
So you don’t even know her? Never met her?
Sounds like you’re desperately trying to prove something to yourself.
Spare me your pretentious drivel. It’s clear you have a petty and stupid reason hidden somewhere deep inside. Freaks like you always have.

I don’t need it. Her existence was enough. Her stupid, happy-go-lucky existence in this stupid, happy-go-lucky virtual world… world people built themselves but have no control over.[pause] But I, I have control. I bend your reality to my will. I manipulate your very thoughts. I turn Ash’s dreams into ash.[pause] You gave me this power when you started to live in that world. Is it wrong to use it?

I do nothing of the sort! Her existence is all the proof you need. Her stupid, happy-go-lucky existence in this stupid, happy-go-lucky virtual world… world people built themselves but have no control over.[pause] But I, I have control. I bend your reality to my will. I manipulate your very thoughts. I turn Ash’s dreams into ash.[pause] You gave me this power when you started to live in that world. Is it wrong to use it?

I have nothing of the sort! Her existence was reason enough. Her stupid, happy-go-lucky existence in this stupid, happy-go-lucky virtual world… world people built themselves but have no control over.[pause] But I, I have control. I bend your reality to my will. I manipulate your very thoughts. I turn Ash’s dreams into ash.[pause] You gave me this power when you started to live in that world. Is it wrong to use it?
Do you really have to ask this question? With power comes responsibility… but you’ve failed in that department spectacularly.
You’re delusional… and dangerous. A skillful hacker with the mindset of a teenage internet troll. I’m glad this incident will be your last.
And here we have our petty reason in all its petty glory. I think I’ve heard enough.
No, there was no failure. On the contrary, it was the beginning of a long success. My next target will be you; you’ve earned it fair and square, congratulations![pause] Be ready. Be warned. Fear me.
No, my friend, it won’t. I’m just getting started. My next target will be you; you’ve earned it fair and square, congratulations![pause] Be ready. Be warned. Fear me.
No, you’re just starting to hear from me. My next target will be you; you’ve earned it fair and square, congratulations![pause] Be ready. Be warned. Fear me.
Yeah, yeah. My colleague will be dropping by soon; he will escort you somewhere you belong. That will be all.
Whatever… I can see this was a total waste of time. Enjoy your freedom; you have about 2 hours left of it.
(Ask Ashley) And what’s behind these doors?
Clothes. Piles upon piles of them, more than I could possibly wear. Whenever I had free time and some spare money, I’d go shopping.[pause] I wonder why I thought that I actually need so many.
Yeah, you and everybody else.
I blame capitalism.
Well, now you’ve realized it. It wasn’t all in vain.
Thanks… still, it was my own choice. It seems unfair to blame anything or anybody else except myself.
Thanks… but it seems unfair to blame anything or anybody else except myself.
Yeah, I wish I could look at it this way.
(Say to Ashley) Nice tree.
(Say to Ashley) Don’t plain bookshelves cut it anymore in this day and age?

Thanks. I might have gone overboard with the decor, though… These bright colors, this tree, this line of photos on the walls – sometimes it feels like they’re all screaming at me.[pause] I wonder if I just wanted to convince myself what a creative and expressive person I am.

It seemed like an interesting idea at the time. But yeah, I probably went overboard with the decor… These bright colors, this tree, this line of photos on the walls – sometimes it feels like they’re all screaming at me.[pause] I wonder if I just wanted to convince myself what a creative and expressive person I am.
(Ask Ashley) You play the guitar too?

The guitar and piano, though “play” is much too strong of a word. We got it as a prop for the show, and we had to store it somewhere, but then I thought, as I long as I keep them, I might as well fool around a bit.[pause] It’s silly, really. Every kid wants to play the guitar… and I’m not even a kid anymore.
You don’t have to be ashamed of every single thing in your apartment, you know.
Yeah, well… if you’re in a mood to question your choices, I won’t stop you.
Yeah, sorry. I guess I simply can’t stop questioning everything around me.[pause] Was it real and valid? Or was it just my blissful ignorance that made it look this way?

Sorry… I don’t want to impose on you with my problems any more than I already did. But it’s hard to stop looking around and thinking.[pause] Was any of this real and valid? Or was it just my blissful ignorance that made it look this way?
